text:
Dreams come true if you truly believe in them and Indian-origin Youtube star Lilly Singh's success story is a big proof of the same.
Twitter
She recently announced that she will be replacing Carson Daly's Last Call and host a Late Night Show on NBC.
Lilly Singh who is known by her stage name Superwoman is all set to host the show titled A Little Late With Lilly Singh and it will debut in September on the 1:30 am spot. As soon as the news was revealed, everyone started pouring congratulatory messages for her.
Twitter
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
Apart from her fans and family, an adorable wish came from her BFF Priyanka Chopra. Sharing an empowering quote, PC's message sums up the basic essence of female friendships. She wrote,
Screengrab
"So proud of @iisuperwomanii... First woman... of colour... to be late night show host...Break them barriers baby! So proud".
Lilly Singh has a fan base of 14 million followers on YouTube and it was on her appearance on Jimmy Fallon's "Tonight Show", where she spoke about the show.
NBC
She said, "I'm so excited because I truly get to create a show from scratch. I get to make it inclusive... and create something I really believe in."
title: Real Women Fix Each Other's Crown: PC's Congratulatory Wish To BFF Lilly Singh Is All Hearts!
description: Lilly Singh who is known by her stage name Superwoman is all set to host the show titled A Little Late With Lilly Singh and it will debut in September on the 1:30 am spot. As soon as the news was revealed, everyone started pouring congratulatory messages for her.
